name: Dead Man's Hand (itch)
description:
A western roguelike for 7DRL 2020.

Explore this lively wild west town and earn the biggest fortune you can!

Use the arrow keys or numpad to move into a poker table to join a game. I recommend that you play the version on https://bleakley.github.io/dead-mans-hand/ instead of the embedded version above. If you play it outside of an iframe the arrows and escape keys will work as intended.

Watch a developer Let's Play video here: 

View the source code at https://github.com/bleakley/dead-mans-hand
